NEW YORK A nationwide
Marshall Plan to end poverty
in Negro ghettos is the "last
best hope" to right historic in
justice and prevent future >riots,
said Whitney Young, Jr.. Ma
tional Urban League executive
director. He was ddressing a
graduating class of Negro secre-
taries who had completed
special training course at New
York University.


He urged the nation to take "a
second look" at the Leagues do
nestle Marshall Plan. proposed
in June, 1868. 1t urged mas
sive crash program to upgrade
the skills, housing and educa-
tional opportunities of Negroes
trough wide variety of public
and private actions. 1t also
called upon Negroes to make
extra efforts to qualify them
selves for new opportunities.


When announced, the Leagues
board of trustees warned that
northern ghettos we're ION the
verge of taking flame" state
ment, Young said today. that now
has 1.-THE ring of prophecy"

Young Says A
New Plan Needed

ATLANTA, Ga. The 9th An
nual Convention of the Southern
Christian Leadership c Conference
will be held in Savannah, Ca,
Sept. % : Oct. 2.


DR.. Martin Luther King, Jr.
has scheduled acknowledgement
speakers to help assess the status
of the civil rights movement since
passage of the Civil Rights Law
and aid in charting new courses
in the freedom movement.


A city-wide mass rally, held at
The First African Baptist
Chruch, will kick off the four-day
meet the evening of September %,
with AFL-CIO Vice President
A. Phillip Randolph and James
Farmer, director of the Congress
of Racial Equality, listed prin-
cipal speakers.

The most savage race riot
in American history took place
in East St. Louis in 1917. At
least SO Negroes and 9 whites
were killed. Two years later in
Chicago, % Negroes and is
whites lost their lives. On that
summer, 26 race riots took place
across the country.)


In 1913 in Detroit, in the last
of such large scale bloody
clashes in northern city, Is
Negroes and 9 whites were killed.


You can warm the sweet rolls
on top of the stove if you don't
want to turn on the oven. Just
put them over low heat in
stove-to-table sauce pan. Sprin-
kle the rolls with a bit of water
if they seem dry. Please put the
pan in it's warming stand for
serving, or use hot pads. The
table finish doesn't take kindly to
hot dishes. Take these hints, dear
heart, and your breakfasts will
be as luscious as your grilled
steaks.

Good taste and good nutrition
are two reas ons why American
consumers like milk and other
dairy foods. Increased public
knowledge of nutrition and its
importance in human health &C
count for remarkable recent
gains in the per capita consump-
ton of fluid whole milk, and
record use of cheese and other
dairy products.
